motionparams Struct Reference

#include <ProbabilisticEgomotion.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

motionparams struct for storing 3D egomotion parameters.

Code for computing Egomotion from correspondence probability distributions. the function getmotion provides the entire public interface.

printmotion is a trivial function which prints out the motion parameters in a motionparams struct.

Justin Domke
